main event: Witnesses observed a bright lit object with white lights rotating counter-clockwise in the sky over Rocky, Oklahoma on June 19, 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as having a glowing center surrounded by many white lights,The sighting lasted approximately 2-3 minutes before the object disappeared,The object emitted a sound similar to a helicopter during the observation,There were no local aircraft reported in the vicinity during the time of the sighting,The sighting was reported to the U.S. Air Force and was categorized as unidentified.
sighted object: a glowing object with white lights
witness description: Two boys, approximately ages 18, reported the sighting while unloading hay.
